title: Three people installed VS 15.9 - three different MSBuild versions?!
body:
### Steps to reproduce

Three people updated their Visual Studio 2017 to 15.9 and all three got different MSBuild versions:

15.9.28307.280 or .344 or .423

### Expected  behavior

We experience problems with all versions but .423 (i.e., tests using Roslyn fail unexpectedly). Is this to be expected?

### Actual behavior

No problems when creating the MSBuildWorkspace in our Roslyn tests.

### Environment data
`msbuild /version` output: 15.9.28307.XXX

OS info: Windows 10

If applicable, version of the tool that invokes MSBuild (Visual Studio, dotnet CLI, etc): VS 2017 15.9

### Questions

Where to obtain the newest version of MSBuild with the highest revision number?

nodes.body: Oh, that's the Visual Studio version not the MSBuild version. Sorry, wrong repository.
